title: Senior Executive - Business Development
description: A leading IT company specializing in innovative technology solutions, is seeking a highly motivated and dynamic individual to join our team as a Senior Executive - Business Development. This is an excellent opportunity for an experienced professional with a proven track record in driving business growth and building strategic partnerships within the IT industry.

title: Jr. Software Engineer (Java Spring Boot)
description: Digital Run Limited, a leading software company, is seeking highly skilled and motivated Spring Boot Developers to join our dynamic team. If you have a passion for software development, expertise in Spring Boot, and at least 6 months of experience in the field, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

title: Software Engineer (PHP Laravel)
description: BSc or MSc in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent.

title: AVP / VP of Business Development
description: Digital Run Limited, a trailblazing IT company at the forefront of cutting-edge technology solutions, is seeking an ambitious and results-driven individual to join our leadership team as AVP / VP of Business Development. If you have a passion for driving growth, forging strategic partnerships, and delivering exceptional results, this is the perfect opportunity to elevate your career and make a lasting impact within the IT industry.
